content: Just a heads up, the cargo PRs should now be milestoned by their release. If you want to update the relnotes tool to query the milestone instead of by date, that might help with fetching the correct PRs.
@Eric Huss out of interest, how did you do that? It'd be maybe good to get that code into triagebot if it's something we can share with other submodules easily
https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/blob/master/src/handlers/milestone_prs.rs is the rust-lang/rust code for it

It's a hacky script here: https://github.com/ehuss/cargo-new-release/blob/master/src/bin/milestone.rs

I thought of making it part of the regular triagebot milestoning, but I didn't feel like spending the time to figure out how to make that happen. The process of associating the commit to the submodule PRs would require a lot of stuff (fetching a diff of the commit to find the submodules, then fetching logs of those submodules, etc.).

That would be better, I just didn't want to spend more time on it.
I had started a local thing at one point with thanks (which already does the submodule diffing) to also milestone, but it stalled out
